content: I understand your interpretation, but I think it misses the mark. Text has overtaken speaking as the method of modern communication and text conveys rate of speaking poorly. Ellipses help convey rate of words. The ellipses is gaining usage because it helps with this aspect of text when the text is conversational. This is also the source of a lot of grammar stickler’s frustration with extra commas. Your interpretation of ellipses as passive aggressive may be more about those you surround yourself with, or how you use it.
